overview: Sweetheart is delighted to present the latest star showcase in the award winning "Loves Girls" series. Popular Fleshlight girl and former Digital Playground contract star Kayden Kross sizzles in four beautifully constructed scenes, each with its own theme. Kayden's handpicked co-stars are wonderfully diverse, and each girl fulfills all of Kayden's fantasies in this heart-stopping movie! Featuring Valentina Nappi, Leigh Raven, Lily Cade and Amarna Miller.
title: Kayden Loves Girls
